subject: re:Best medications, best prices
body:
Dear customer.
Tired of paying twice the price of a med when buying it from a "reliable" licensed USA Web pharmacy? Our discount Canadian e-shop will show you what real "low prices" should look like.
Our advice for everyone shopping for medications on the Web is to cling to reliable licensed pharmacies that have been operating on the Internet market for quite a long time already (such as CanadianPharmacy) Want to save on drugs? Try CanadianPharmacy - #1 discount Canadian pharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy the easiest and the cheapest way to take care of your health.
Yours,Kermit Good
